text: Brandy () is a 1964 Spanish/Italian western film directed by José Luis Borau and Mario Caiano, composed by Riz Ortolani and starring Alex Nicol, Roberto Undari and Renzo Palmer. It is based on a story by , who created the character El Coyote. It is the film debut of Mario Caiano. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1964 Western (genre) films Category:Spanish Western (genre) films Category:Spanish films Category:Italian Western (genre) films Category:Italian films Category:Spaghetti Western films Category:Films directed by José Luis Borau Category:Films directed by Mario Caiano Category:Films scored by Riz Ortolani Category:Paramount Pictures films Category:Something Weird Video Category:Films based on short fiction
title: Brandy (film)
